title: person
description: A generic person record.(This datatype is created as per HL7 FHIR Release 5 specifications)

xdm:identifier.title: Identifier
xdm:identifier.description: A human identifier for this person.

xdm:active.title: Is Active
xdm:active.description: Indicates whether the  person's record is in active use.

xdm:name.title: Name
xdm:name.description: A name associated with the person.

xdm:telecom.title: Contact Details
xdm:telecom.description: A contact detail (e.g. a telephone number or an email address) by which the person may be contacted.

xdm:birthDate.title: Birth Date
xdm:birthDate.description: The date of birth for the individual

xdm:deceasedBoolean.title: Deceased Indicator
xdm:deceasedBoolean.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.

xdm:deceasedDateTime.title: Deceased Date Time
xdm:deceasedDateTime.description: Date Time if the person is deceased.

xdm:address.title: Address
xdm:address.description: One or more addresses for the person.

xdm:communication.title: Communication
xdm:communication.description: A language which may be used to communicate with the person about his or her health.

xdm:language.title: Language
xdm:language.description: The language which can be used to communicate with the person about his or her health.

xdm:managingOrganization.title: Managing Organization
xdm:managingOrganization.description: Organization that is the custodian of the patient record.

xdm:link.title: Person Link Details
xdm:link.description: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person.

xdm:target.title: Target
xdm:target.description: The resource to which this actual person is associated.
